notes.title: Author Contributions
notes.p: L.O.C. and C.P. performed the experimental design, conceptualization, and writingâ€”original draft preparation, review, and editing; C.S., S.N.V., and M.-L.J. performed the biological analysis; C.L.N., S.G.N., and B.T. performed the synthesis and characterization of nanoparticles. Each contributor was essential to the production of this work.
